metadata.name: The cult of Kalika
metadata.description:
the Kalika cult, is one of the most feared and ruthless factions of the Loka universe, molded by the fierce image of goddess Kali, they re known to engage in everything occult and taboo, these bewitchingly charming demons disguised as deities enjoy safeguarding their ideals and the city as much as engaging in debauchery and malice.

Duration: 00:12s looped
2500x2500 px
